protocol.name: P-GSE35869-3
protocol.text: Arabidopsis thaliana plants were grown on quarter-strength MS media at 28oC with 16-h-light/8-h-dark cycle

protocol.name: P-GSE35869-4
protocol.text: RNeasy column (Qiagen) using the manufacturers’ protocols

protocol.name: P-GSE35869-5
protocol.text: Biotinylated cRNA were prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol from 6 ug total RNA (Expression Analysis Technical Manual, 2001, Affymetrix).

protocol.name: P-GSE35869-6
protocol.text: Affymetrix Eukaryotic Target Hybridization protocol (GeneChip® Expression Analysis Technical Manual)

protocol.name: P-GSE35869-7
protocol.text: Affymetrix® GeneChip® Scanner 3000 with GCOS software according to manufactuer's protocol (GeneChip® Expression Analysis Technical Manual)

protocol.name: P-GSE35869-8
protocol.text: Probe set summarization and normalization was performed by robust multi-array averaging (RMA, including background subtraction, summarization by median polish and quantile normalization) using the R/Bioconductor package affy.
